ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of MARK FERRARI of Burnaby, British Columbia, as a part-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Vancouver Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective January 22, 2021.
